snippet: A former pediatrician who worked as the medical director of Phillips Academy in Andover was sentenced on Wednesday to six-and-a-half years in prison on child pornography charges.
abstract: Dr Richard Keller, former pediatrician who worked as the medical director of Phillips Academy in Andover, Mass, is sentenced to six-and-a-half years in prison on child pornography charges.
lead_paragraph: A former pediatrician who worked as the medical director of Phillips Academy in Andover was sentenced on Wednesday to six-and-a-half years in prison on child pornography charges.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Ex-School Doctor Sentenced for Child Pornography
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Ex-School Doctor Sentenced for Child Pornography
